description:
Once again, Koizumi-san cooly declines Yuu`s invitation to go eat together, but giving up is not Yuu`s style. The two of them actually meet at a ramen shop, but it`s jam-packed and there are single seat cubicles and Koizumi-san could not be further away!
However, Yuu`s going to have her moment in the sun where she gets to flex her cooking chops...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nouilles Saimin / Le comptoir concentré sur les saveurs / Ramen instantanés
Saimin / Aji Shuuchuu Counter / Sokuseki Men
Saimin / Flavor Concentration Counter / Instant Noodles
サイミン / 味集中カウンター / 即席麺
